messages.subject: Re: George Lucas made a Samurai film !!
messages.msgSnippet: He was a producer on Kagemusha , but Akira Kurosawa was the director...
messages.messageBody:
He was a producer on 'Kagemusha', but Akira Kurosawa was the director...


--- In samuraihistory@y..., "squrpio_prince" <squrpio_prince@y...> wrote:
> I saw a movie at blockbuster ( It was rented out) that was a
> samurai movie that said that it was directed or produced by George
> Lucas. I don't remember what it was called by I do remember that it
> was made in 1980.
>
> Ryan

messages.subject: George Lucas made a Samurai film !!
messages.msgSnippet: I saw a movie at blockbuster ( It was rented out) that was a samurai movie that said that it was directed or produced by George Lucas. I don t remember what it
messages.messageBody:
I saw a movie at blockbuster ( It was rented out) that was a
samurai movie that said that it was directed or produced by George
Lucas. I don't remember what it was called by I do remember that it
was made in 1980.

Ryan
